page.title: 05HARTHILL MORRIS MEN
page.content: Harthill{morris}started in{1976}, 9 years ago .Most of the dances they peform come from{Cotswold}villages but now some of them come from Lichfield .They wear three quarter length black trousers ,a white shirt ,a yellow and black tabard with an{emblem}on , this is made up of a picture of a hart in a circle , white socks , black shoes some bells and a black bowler hat . The fool wears a blue smock and a top hat . He also carries a pigs bladder with a cows tail on the end . It is lucky if you are hit by the pigs bladder or nudged by the hart . A morris man is dressed up as the hart in a long cloak and the harts head.The morris men dance all round the year.They perform in public and at private functions.They danced before the{Queen}in Worksop 1981.They also perform a mummers play "T'owd Tup"
